name: Mourning Sun
description:
This game makes use of bright lights and high-pitched sound.

Lyrics:
Tome agre lese/Ha numare duun
Tome numa ha lu/Tome jor hun

Yol lese di jold/yi holg mol
Yol lese di kort/yi jor mol

Yol lese di sumoh/To sua rean dan
Yol lese di gre/To sua han

Tome aga tomae sola lese

Created for Extra Credits Game Jam 6: Theme "Take Care"
Bonus Challenges: Distance, Language
Team members:
Greg Miller (Bobberto, DarthBob14)
Joshua Liew (Dualeez, Beastcramps)
Simon Miller (A_Knight_Errant)
Arianna (Blue Angel)

Special thanks to Gabe, Jordan, and Kristin for playtesting!
